se.kth.inda.indaprojekt.engine

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.inda.indaprojekt.engine.WorldObject
      • se.kth.inda.indaprojekt.engine.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Wizard

    public abstract class Unit
extends WorldObject
    A Unit is a WorldObject that is defined by its' living characteristics, it has health that can be decreased by damage and ultimately die if it takes too much of a beating.
    Author:
    David Masko
